subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Indiana Pacers guard Jamaal Tinsley and his teammates Marquis Daniels and Keith McLeod were involved in a fight with a bar manager after a home loss to Golden State, the Indianapolis police said Wednesday.
snippet: Indiana Pacers guard Jamaal Tinsley and his teammates Marquis Daniels and Keith McLeod were involved in a fight with a bar manager after a home loss to Golden State, the Indianapolis police said Wednesday.
